A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The special effects are ok\, but overall it's a very bad written movie\, it destroys the storyline of VII\, it disrespects the characters of the original trilogy and it really goes nowhere... This movie is so destructive to the Star Wars saga that it may very well have killed it... \nIt would be a very brave and necessary move for Disney to re-do this movie\, to save any enthusiasm for this legendary saga.
